errors.error_description: The supported Python versions are incorrectly stated as 'Python 3.6 or higher', which is too broad and may lead to installation on unsupported older Python versions.
correction_candidates: To install Pastas, a working version of Python 3.9, 3.10, 3.11, or 3.12 has to be installed on your computer.
To install Pastas, any version of Python 3 will work.
To install Pastas, you must use Python 3.11.
To install Pastas, a working version of Python 3.9 or newer has to be installed on your computer.
errors.golden_answer: To install Pastas, a working version of Python 3.9, 3.10, 3.11, or 3.12 has to be installed on your computer.
